@NonNullByDefault

Package com.io7m.jcage.core

Core types and functions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JCClassLoaderPolicyType
    The type of classloader policies.
    JCClassNameResolverType
    A mapping from class names to bytes.
    JCSandboxesType
    The main interface allowing the creation and configuration of sandboxes.
    JCSandboxType
    The type of sandboxes.
    JCSequentialPolicyBuilderType
    A sequential policy builder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JCClassLoader
    A sandboxing class loader.
    JCClassLoaderPolicyUnrestricted
    A class loader policy that allows everything.
    JCClassNameResolverClasspath
    A class resolver that can load class data from the current classpath.
    JCClassNameResolverURLs
    A class resolver that can load class data from a list of URLs.
    JCPolicy
    The main sandboxing Policy implementation.
    JCSandboxAdminPermission
    Permissions required to administer the sandbox system.
    JCSandboxes
    The default implementation of the JCSandboxesType interface.
    JCSandboxNames
    Functions to validate sandbox names.
    JCSecurityManager
    The sandboxing security manager.
    JCSequentialPolicy
    A sequential, pattern-based policy.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JCRuleConclusion
    The conclusion of a rule.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JCSandboxClassMissingException
    A class could not be found.
    JCSandboxClassWrongLoaderException
    A class has the wrong class loader.
    JCSandboxDuplicateException
    A sandbox already exists with the given name.
    JCSandboxException
    The type of sandbox exceptions.
    JCSandboxSecurityException
    A SecurityException was raised during an operation.
